title: Tomodachi, Nanoni – Friend, Yet
description:
"Last night, I lost my friend."

Sharp-tongued Sana and blunt Asa have been best friends since high school. They go drinking with each other, live next to each other and know each other better than anyone else. But a fateful summer night leaves their relationship irrevocably changed...

matches.title: Kimi wa Seiya ni Uso wo Tsuku
